segments.text: What happens if we make a deal and thirty to sixty days after delivery the price goes down and you didn't get the best possible price ? How do I handle that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , these things happens , I know that . You just have to stay straight with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right ! So how do I do that ? What will make you happy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I suggest you just keep me posted.That should do it.That way the burden is on me to decide when to buy , not you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , it really is that simple.Every time there's a change in the items we do business on , you let me know . That's all you need to do .
